title: BrandClique Dashboard App
description: Brandclique is a South African brand-creator marketplace featuring an automated campaign management system, real-time analytics dashboards, and creator portfolio interfaces. It is built as a scalable platform capable of handling thousands of concurrent brand-creator interactions.
roleDescription: Developed a React/Next.js dashboard with Tailwind CSS for a brand-creator marketplace, featuring automated campaign management and real-time engagement tools. Developed hybrid B2B/B2C interfaces powered by a Firebase backend for data and campaign storage, ensuring responsive design, scalability, and seamless user interactions.

title: README Prettier Web Tool
description: A simple, intuitive markdown editor that allows developers to quickly create, customize, and generate professional README files for their projects with minimal effort.
roleDescription: Built a responsive markdown editor using React/Next.js with Tailwind CSS, implementing real-time preview, customizable templates, and one-click export functionality. This is a personal project to help myself and fellow developers craft quick README files that are visually appealing and easy to update.
